notesStmt.note: Mounted on guards (modern restoration). Gaps after folio 31. All the leaves are more or less worm-eaten.
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: Fragments of Arabic commentaries on Numbers, Leviticus and Deuteronomy.
